entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 04:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or drizzle after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
